# Mushood - Personal Portfolio Website

> A modern, responsive personal portfolio website showcasing professional experience, skills, projects, and blog posts.

## Project Overview

This is a single-page portfolio application built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The website features a clean, professional design with smooth animations and a fully responsive layout that adapts to all screen sizes.

## Key Information

- **Owner**: Mushood (Khawaja Muhammad Mushood)
- **Role**: Software Engineer
- **Location**: Lahore, Pakistan
- **Email**: khawaja.muhammad.mushood@gmail.com
- **Website**: https://mushood123.github.io/
- **Tech Stack**: HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript
- **Design**: Mobile-first, responsive, modern UI/UX

## Professional Profile

### Current Position
Software Engineer at Texagon (Aug 2025 - Present)
- Full-stack web applications using React and Node.js with Nest.js
- High-speed RESTful APIs with Redis caching
- Supabase integration for enhanced reliability

### Previous Experience
- Web Developer at Code To Kloud (April 2025 - Aug 2025)
- Software Engineer Intern at Arbisoft (July 2024 - Sep 2024)

### Education
BSc in Computer Science from University of Management and Technology (2021-2025)
CGPA: 3.7/4.0

## Technical Skills

### Frontend Development (90%)
- React / React Native
- Next.js, TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Redux / Redux Toolkit / Redux Saga

### Backend Development (85%)
- Node.js / Express / Nest.js
- RESTful APIs
- JWT Authentication
- HIPAA-aligned security practices

### Database & ORM (80%)
- PostgreSQL
- Prisma ORM
- Redis caching

### Cloud & DevOps (75%)
- AWS (EC2, RDS, Nginx, PM2)
- CI/CD (CircleCI, GitHub Actions)
- Supabase Integration

### Mobile Development
- React Native
- Firebase (Realtime DB, Auth, Push Notifications)
- Context API state management

### Testing & Quality
- Jest
- Snapshot Testing
- Unit Testing

### Tools & Version Control (90%)
- Git / GitHub
- npm / Yarn
- Styled Components & Animations

## Services Offered

1. **Frontend Development**: Responsive and user-friendly websites using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS

2. **Backend Development**: Scalable and efficient backend systems using Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, and Nest.js

3. **Mobile Apps**: Cross-platform mobile apps using React Native for fast and efficient development

4. **AI and Automation**: AI-based automation solutions using n8n, OpenAI, and other modern tools

## Project Structure

```
Portfolio-FE/
├── index.html              # Main HTML file (1130 lines)
├── robots.txt              # Search engine directives
├── sitemap.xml             # Main sitemap
├── sitemap-index.xml       # Sitemap index
├── sitemap-main.xml        # Main pages sitemap
├── sitemap-blog.xml        # Blog posts sitemap
├── sitemap-social.xml      # Social profiles sitemap
├── google1a6ee1d70bb049f0.html  # Google verification
├── README.md               # Project documentation
└── assets/
    ├── css/
    │   └── style.css       # Main stylesheet
    ├── js/
    │   └── script.js       # Main JavaScript
    ├── images/             # Images, icons, and project screenshots
    └── resume/             # Resume PDF

```

## Website Sections

### 1. About
- Professional introduction and bio
- Service offerings showcase
- What I'm doing section with 4 main services

### 2. Resume
- Education timeline
- Professional experience timeline
- Skills visualization with progress bars
- Downloadable resume PDF

### 3. Portfolio
- Filterable project gallery
- Categories: Web Development, Web Design, Applications
- Interactive project cards with hover effects

### 4. Blog
- Integration with Medium blog posts
- Featured articles on React, development tools, and best practices
- External links to full articles

### 5. Contact
- Interactive contact form with validation
- Google Maps integration
- Contact information display

## Key Features

- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach with collapsible sidebar
- **SPA Navigation**: Single-page application behavior without page reloads
- **Portfolio Filtering**: Real-time project filtering by category
- **Form Validation**: Dynamic contact form with real-time validation
- **SEO Optimized**: Semantic HTML, meta tags, sitemaps, robots.txt
- **Performance**: Lazy loading images, minimal dependencies, vanilla JavaScript

## Design System

### Colors
- Primary: Orange Yellow Crayola (hsl(45, 100%, 72%))
- Accent: Vegas Gold (hsl(45, 54%, 58%))
- Background: Eerie Black (hsl(240, 2%, 13%))
- Text: Light Gray (hsl(0, 0%, 84%))

### Typography
- Font Family: Poppins (Google Fonts)
- Font Weights: 300, 400, 500, 600

### Effects
- Smooth transitions (0.25s - 0.5s)
- Gradient backgrounds
- Backdrop blur effects
- Multiple shadow layers for depth

## Blog Topics

Featured articles on:
- React 19's Activity Component

- Zoom Web SDK Integration

## Browser Support

- Chrome (latest)
- Firefox (latest)
- Safari (latest)
- Edge (latest)
- Mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Chrome Mobile)

## Performance Optimizations

- Lazy loading for images
- Minimal dependencies (only Ionicons)
- Optimized CSS with custom properties
- Vanilla JavaScript for fast load times
- Compressed image assets

## Accessibility

- Semantic HTML5 elements
- Proper heading hierarchy
- Alt text for all images
- Keyboard navigation support
- ARIA attributes where needed
